mapper.insert: insert into book (title, author, isbn, category_id, publisher, publish_date, price, stock, description, cover, create_time, update_time) values (#{title}, #{author}, #{isbn}, #{categoryId}, #{publisher}, #{publishDate}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{description}, #{cover}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from book where isbn = #{isbn}
select b.*, c.name as category_name from book b left join category c on b.category_id = c.id where b.id = #{id}

select count(*) from book b
and b.title like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
and b.author like concat('%', #{author}, '%')
and b.category_id = #{categoryId}
